name: Nami
text: On Play If your Leader is [Nami], give up to 1 rested DON!! card to your Leader. Then, play up to 1 Character card with a cost of 2 or less from your hand.

effect.text: If your Leader is [Nami], give up to 1 rested DON!! card to your Leader. Then, play up to 1 Character card with a cost of 2 or less from your hand.
